Name: Export-VMCheckpoint
Synopsis: Exports a virtual machine checkpoint to disk.

Name: Get-VMCheckpoint
Synopsis: Gets the checkpoints associated with a virtual machine or checkpoint.

Name: Remove-VMCheckpoint
Synopsis: Deletes a virtual machine checkpoint.

Name: Rename-VMCheckpoint
Synopsis: Renames a virtual machine checkpoint.

Name: Restore-VMCheckpoint
Synopsis: Restores a virtual machine checkpoint.

Name: Add-VMAssignableDevice
Synopsis:
Add-VMAssignableDevice [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-InstancePath <string>] [-LocationPath <string>] [-VirtualFunction <uint16>] [-ResourcePoolName <string>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-VMAssignableDevice [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [-InstancePath <string>] [-LocationPath <string>] [-VirtualFunction <uint16>] [-ResourcePoolName <string>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Add-VMDvdDrive
Synopsis: Adds a DVD drive to a virtual machine.

Name: Add-VMFibreChannelHba
Synopsis: Adds a virtual Fibre Channel host bus adapter to a virtual machine.

Name: Add-VMGpuPartitionAdapter
Synopsis:
Add-VMGpuPartitionAdapter [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-Passthru] [-MinPartitionVRAM <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionVRAM <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionVRAM <uint64>] [-MinPartitionEncode <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionEncode <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionEncode <uint64>] [-MinPartitionDecode <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionDecode <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionDecode <uint64>] [-MinPartitionCompute <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionCompute <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionCompute <uint64>] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-VMGpuPartitionAdapter [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [-Passthru] [-MinPartitionVRAM <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionVRAM <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionVRAM <uint64>] [-MinPartitionEncode <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionEncode <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionEncode <uint64>] [-MinPartitionDecode <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionDecode <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionDecode <uint64>] [-MinPartitionCompute <uint64>] [-MaxPartitionCompute <uint64>] [-OptimalPartitionCompute <uint64>] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Add-VMGroupMember
Synopsis: Adds group members to a virtual machine group.

Name: Add-VMHardDiskDrive
Synopsis: Adds a hard disk drive to a virtual machine.

Name: Add-VMHostAssignableDevice
Synopsis:
Add-VMHostAssignableDevice -ResourcePoolName <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-Force] [-InstancePath <string>] [-LocationPath <string>] [<CommonParameters>]

Synopsis:
Add-VMKeyStorageDrive [-VMName] <string[]> [[-ControllerNumber] <int>] [[-ControllerLocation] <int>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-ResourcePoolName <string>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-VMKeyStorageDrive [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [[-ControllerNumber] <int>] [[-ControllerLocation] <int>] [-ResourcePoolName <string>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Add-VMMigrationNetwork
Synopsis: Adds a network for virtual machine migration on one or more virtual machine hosts.

Name: Add-VMNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Adds a virtual network adapter to a virtual machine.

Name: Add-VMNetworkAdapterAcl
Synopsis: Creates an ACL to apply to the traffic through a virtual machine network adapter.

Name: Add-VMNetworkAdapterExtendedAcl
Synopsis: Creates an extended ACL for a virtual network adapter.

Name: Add-VMNetworkAdapterRoutingDomainMapping
Synopsis: Adds a routing domain and virtual subnets to a virtual network adapter.

Name: Add-VMPmemController
Synopsis:
Add-VMPmemController [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-VMPmemController [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Add-VMRemoteFx3dVideoAdapter
Synopsis: Adds a RemoteFX video adapter in a virtual machine.

Name: Add-VMScsiController
Synopsis: Adds a SCSI controller in a virtual machine.

Name: Add-VMStoragePath
Synopsis: Adds a path to a storage resource pool.

Name: Add-VMSwitch
Synopsis: Adds a virtual switch to an Ethernet resource pool.

Name: Add-VMSwitchExtensionPortFeature
Synopsis: Adds a feature to a virtual network adapter.

Name: Add-VMSwitchExtensionSwitchFeature
Synopsis: Adds a feature to a virtual switch.

Name: Add-VMSwitchTeamMember
Synopsis: Adds members to a virtual switch team.

Name: Checkpoint-VM
Synopsis: Creates a checkpoint of a virtual machine.

Name: Compare-VM
Synopsis: Compares a virtual machine and a virtual machine host for compatibility, returning a compatibility report.

Name: Complete-VMFailover
Synopsis: Completes a virtual machine's failover process on the Replica server. Removes all recovery points on a failed over virtual machine.

Name: Connect-VMNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Connects a virtual network adapter to a virtual switch.

Name: Connect-VMSan
Synopsis: Associates a host bus adapter with a virtual storage area network (SAN).

Name: Convert-VHD
Synopsis: Converts the format, version type, and block size of a virtual hard disk file.

Name: Copy-VMFile
Synopsis: Copies a file to a virtual machine.

Name: Debug-VM
Synopsis: Debugs a virtual machine.

Name: Disable-VMConsoleSupport
Synopsis: Disables keyboard, video, and mouse for a generation 2 virtual machine.

Name: Disable-VMEventing
Synopsis: Disables virtual machine eventing.

Name: Disable-VMIntegrationService
Synopsis: Disables an integration service on a virtual machine.

Name: Disable-VMMigration
Synopsis: Disables migration on one or more virtual machine hosts.

Name: Disable-VMRemoteFXPhysicalVideoAdapter
Synopsis: Disables one or more RemoteFX physical video adapters from use with RemoteFX-enabled virtual machines.

Name: Disable-VMResourceMetering
Synopsis: Disables collection of resource utilization data for a virtual machine or resource pool.

Name: Disable-VMSwitchExtension
Synopsis: Disables one or more extensions on one or more virtual switches.

Name: Disable-VMTPM
Synopsis: Disables TPM functionality on a virtual machine.

Name: Disconnect-VMNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Disconnects a virtual network adapter from a virtual switch or Ethernet resource pool.

Name: Disconnect-VMSan
Synopsis: Removes a host bus adapter from a virtual storage area network (SAN).

Name: Dismount-VHD
Synopsis: Dismounts a virtual hard disk.

Name: Dismount-VMHostAssignableDevice
Synopsis: Dismount-VMHostAssignableDevice [[-InstancePath] <string>] [[-LocationPath] <string>] [-Force] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Enable-VMConsoleSupport
Synopsis: Enables keyboard, video, and mouse for virtual machines.

Name: Enable-VMEventing
Synopsis: Enables virtual machine eventing.

Name: Enable-VMIntegrationService
Synopsis: Enables an integration service on a virtual machine.

Name: Enable-VMMigration
Synopsis: Enables migration on one or more virtual machine hosts.

Name: Enable-VMRemoteFXPhysicalVideoAdapter
Synopsis: Enables one or more RemoteFX physical video adapters for use with RemoteFX-enabled virtual machines.

Name: Enable-VMReplication
Synopsis: Enables replication of a virtual machine.

Name: Enable-VMResourceMetering
Synopsis: Collects resource utilization data for a virtual machine or resource pool.

Name: Enable-VMSwitchExtension
Synopsis: Enables one or more extensions on one or more switches.

Name: Enable-VMTPM
Synopsis: Enables TPM functionality on a virtual machine.

Name: Export-VM
Synopsis: Exports a virtual machine to disk.

Name: Export-VMSnapshot
Synopsis: Exports a virtual machine checkpoint to disk.

Name: Get-VHD
Synopsis: Gets the virtual hard disk object associated with a virtual hard disk.

Name: Get-VHDSet
Synopsis: Gets information about a VHD set.

Name: Get-VHDSnapshot
Synopsis: Gets information about a checkpoint in a VHD set.

Name: Get-VM
Synopsis: Gets the virtual machines from one or more Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Get-VMAssignableDevice
Synopsis:
Get-VMAssignableDevice [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-VMAssignableDevice [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-VMBios
Synopsis: Gets the BIOS of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMComPort
Synopsis: Gets the COM ports of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMConnectAccess
Synopsis: Gets entries showing users and the virtual machines to which they can connect on one or more Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Get-VMDvdDrive
Synopsis: Gets the DVD drives attached to a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMFibreChannelHba
Synopsis: Gets the Fibre Channel host bus adapters associated with one or more virtual machines.

Name: Get-VMFirmware
Synopsis: Gets the firmware configuration of a virtual machine.

Name: Get-VMFloppyDiskDrive
Synopsis: Gets the floppy disk drives of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMGpuPartitionAdapter
Synopsis:
Get-VMGpuPartitionAdapter [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-AdapterId <string>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-VMGpuPartitionAdapter [-VMSnapshot] <VMSnapshot> [<CommonParameters>]

Get-VMGpuPartitionAdapter [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [-AdapterId <string>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-VMGroup
Synopsis: Gets virtual machine groups.

Name: Get-VMHardDiskDrive
Synopsis: Gets the virtual hard disk drives attached to one or more virtual machines.

Name: Get-VMHost
Synopsis: Gets a Hyper-V host.

Name: Get-VMHostAssignableDevice
Synopsis: Get-VMHostAssignableDevice [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-VMHostCluster
Synopsis: Gets virtual machine host clusters.

Name: Get-VMHostNumaNode
Synopsis: Gets the NUMA topology of a virtual machine host.

Name: Get-VMHostNumaNodeStatus
Synopsis: Gets the status of the virtual machines on the non-uniform memory access (NUMA) nodes of a virtual machine host or hosts.

Name: Get-VMHostSupportedVersion
Synopsis: Returns a list of virtual machine configuration versions that are supported on a host.

Name: Get-VMIdeController
Synopsis: Gets the IDE controllers of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMIntegrationService
Synopsis: Gets the integration services of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMKeyProtector
Synopsis: Retrieves a key protector for a virtual machine.

Name: Get-VMKeyStorageDrive
Synopsis:
Get-VMKeyStorageDrive [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-ControllerLocation <int>] [-ControllerNumber <int>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-VMKeyStorageDrive [-VMDriveController] <VMDriveController[]> [-ControllerLocation <int>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-VMMemory
Synopsis: Gets the memory of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMMigrationNetwork
Synopsis: Gets the networks added for migration to one or more virtual machine hosts.

Name: Get-VMNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Gets the virtual network adapters of a virtual machine, snapshot, management operating system, or of a virtual machine and management operating system.

Name: Get-VMNetworkAdapterAcl
Synopsis: Gets the ACLs configured for a virtual machine network adapter.

Name: Get-VMNetworkAdapterExtendedAcl
Synopsis: Gets extended ACLs configured for a virtual network adapter.

Name: Get-VMNetworkAdapterFailoverConfiguration
Synopsis: Gets the IP address of a virtual network adapter configured to be used when a virtual machine fails over.

Name: Get-VMNetworkAdapterIsolation
Synopsis: Gets isolation settings for a virtual network adapter.

Synopsis:
Get-VMNetworkAdapterRdma [-VMName] <string> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-Name <string>] [-Passthru] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-VMNetworkAdapterRdma [-VMNetworkAdapter] <VMNetworkAdapterBase> [-Passthru] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-VMNetworkAdapterRdma [-VM] <VirtualMachine> [-Name <string>] [-Passthru] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-VMNetworkAdapterRoutingDomainMapping
Synopsis: Gets members of a routing domain.

Name: Get-VMNetworkAdapterVlan
Synopsis: Gets the virtual LAN settings configured on a virtual network adapter.

Synopsis:
Get-VMPartitionableGpu [[-ComputerName] <string[]>] [[-Credential] <pscredential[]>] [-Name <string>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-VMProcessor
Synopsis: Gets the processor of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMRemoteFx3dVideoAdapter
Synopsis: Gets the RemoteFX video adapter of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMRemoteFXPhysicalVideoAdapter
Synopsis: Gets the RemoteFX physical graphics adapters on one or more Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Get-VMReplication
Synopsis: Gets the replication settings for a virtual machine.

Name: Get-VMReplicationAuthorizationEntry
Synopsis: Gets the authorization entries of a Replica server.

Name: Get-VMReplicationServer
Synopsis: Gets the replication and authentication settings of a Replica server.

Name: Get-VMResourcePool
Synopsis: Gets the resource pools on one or more virtual machine hosts.

Name: Get-VMSan
Synopsis: Gets the available virtual machine storage area networks on a Hyper-V host or hosts.

Name: Get-VMScsiController
Synopsis: Gets the SCSI controllers of a virtual machine or snapshot.

Name: Get-VMSecurity
Synopsis: Gets security information about a virtual machine.

Name: Get-VMSnapshot
Synopsis: Gets the checkpoints associated with a virtual machine or checkpoint.

Name: Get-VMStoragePath
Synopsis: Gets the storage paths in a storage resource pool.

Name: Get-VMStorageSettings
Synopsis:
Get-VMStorageSettings [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-VMSwitch
Synopsis: Gets virtual switches from one or more virtual Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Get-VMSwitchExtension
Synopsis: Gets the extensions on one or more virtual switches.

Name: Get-VMSwitchExtensionPortData
Synopsis: Retrieves the status of a virtual switch extension feature applied to a virtual network adapter.

Name: Get-VMSwitchExtensionPortFeature
Synopsis: Gets the features configured on a virtual network adapter.

Name: Get-VMSwitchExtensionSwitchData
Synopsis: Gets the status of a virtual switch extension feature applied on a virtual switch.

Name: Get-VMSwitchExtensionSwitchFeature
Synopsis: Gets the features configured on a virtual switch.

Name: Get-VMSwitchTeam
Synopsis: Gets virtual switch teams from Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Get-VMSystemSwitchExtension
Synopsis: Gets the switch extensions installed on a virtual machine host.

Name: Get-VMSystemSwitchExtensionPortFeature
Synopsis: Gets the port-level features supported by virtual switch extensions on one or more Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Get-VMSystemSwitchExtensionSwitchFeature
Synopsis: Gets the switch-level features on one or more Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Get-VMVideo
Synopsis: Gets video settings for virtual machines.

Name: Grant-VMConnectAccess
Synopsis: Grants a user or users access to connect to a virtual machine or machines.

Name: Import-VM
Synopsis: Imports a virtual machine from a file.

Name: Import-VMInitialReplication
Synopsis: Imports initial replication files for a Replica virtual machine to complete the initial replication when using external media as the source.

Name: Measure-VM
Synopsis: Reports resource utilization data for one or more virtual machines.

Name: Measure-VMReplication
Synopsis: Gets replication statistics and information associated with a virtual machine.

Name: Measure-VMResourcePool
Synopsis: Reports resource utilization data for one or more resource pools.

Name: Merge-VHD
Synopsis: Merges virtual hard disks.

Name: Mount-VHD
Synopsis: Mounts one or more virtual hard disks.

Name: Mount-VMHostAssignableDevice
Synopsis: Mount-VMHostAssignableDevice [[-HostAssignableDevice] <VMHostAssignableDevice[]>] [[-InstancePath] <string>] [[-LocationPath] <string>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Move-VM
Synopsis: Moves a virtual machine to a new Hyper-V host.

Name: Move-VMStorage
Synopsis: Moves the storage of a virtual machine.

Name: New-VFD
Synopsis: Creates a virtual floppy disk.

Name: New-VHD
Synopsis: Creates one or more new virtual hard disks.

Name: New-VM
Synopsis: Creates a new virtual machine.

Name: New-VMGroup
Synopsis: Creates a virtual machine group.

Name: New-VMReplicationAuthorizationEntry
Synopsis: Creates a new authorization entry that allows one or more primary servers to replicate data to a specified Replica server.

Name: New-VMResourcePool
Synopsis: Creates a resource pool.

Name: New-VMSan
Synopsis: Creates a new virtual storage area network (SAN) on a Hyper-V host.

Name: New-VMSwitch
Synopsis: Creates a new virtual switch on one or more virtual machine hosts.

Name: Optimize-VHD
Synopsis: Optimizes the allocation of space used by virtual hard disk files, except for fixed virtual hard disks.

Name: Optimize-VHDSet
Synopsis: Optimizes VHD set files.

Name: Remove-VHDSnapshot

Name: Remove-VMNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Removes one or more virtual network adapters from a virtual machine.

Synopsis: Removes an ACL applied to the traffic through a virtual network adapter.

Name: Remove-VMNetworkAdapterExtendedAcl
Synopsis: Removes an extended ACL for a virtual network adapter.

Name: Remove-VMNetworkAdapterRoutingDomainMapping

Name: Remove-VMRemoteFx3dVideoAdapter
Synopsis: Removes a RemoteFX 3D video adapter from a virtual machine.

Name: Remove-VMReplication
Synopsis: Removes the replication relationship of a virtual machine.

Name: Remove-VMReplicationAuthorizationEntry
Synopsis: Removes an authorization entry from a Replica server.

Name: Remove-VMResourcePool
Synopsis: Deletes a resource pool from one or more virtual machine hosts.

Name: Remove-VMSan
Synopsis: Removes a virtual storage area network (SAN) from a Hyper-V host.

Name: Remove-VMSavedState
Synopsis: Deletes the saved state of a saved virtual machine.

Name: Remove-VMScsiController
Synopsis: Removes a SCSI controller from a virtual machine.

Name: Remove-VMSnapshot
Synopsis: Deletes a virtual machine checkpoint.

Name: Remove-VMStoragePath
Synopsis: Removes a path from a storage resource pool.

Name: Remove-VMSwitch
Synopsis: Deletes a virtual switch.

Name: Remove-VMSwitchExtensionPortFeature
Synopsis: Removes a feature from a virtual network adapter.

Name: Remove-VMSwitchExtensionSwitchFeature
Synopsis: Removes a feature from a virtual switch.

Name: Remove-VMSwitchTeamMember
Synopsis: Removes a member from a virtual machine switch team.

Name: Rename-VM
Synopsis: Renames a virtual machine.

Name: Rename-VMGroup
Synopsis: Renames virtual machine groups.

Name: Rename-VMNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Renames a virtual network adapter on a virtual machine or on the management operating system.

Name: Rename-VMResourcePool
Synopsis: Renames a resource pool on one or more Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Rename-VMSan
Synopsis: Renames a virtual storage area network (SAN).

Name: Rename-VMSnapshot
Synopsis: Renames a virtual machine checkpoint.

Name: Rename-VMSwitch
Synopsis: Renames a virtual switch.

Name: Repair-VM

Name: Reset-VMResourceMetering
Synopsis: Resets the resource utilization data collected by Hyper-V resource metering.

Name: Resize-VHD

Name: Restore-VMSnapshot
Synopsis: Restores a virtual machine checkpoint.

Name: Revoke-VMConnectAccess

Name: Save-VM
Synopsis: Saves a virtual machine.

Name: Set-VHD
Synopsis: Sets properties associated with a virtual hard disk.

Name: Set-VM

Synopsis: Configures the memory of a virtual machine.

Synopsis: Configures features of the virtual network adapter in a virtual machine or the management operating system.

Synopsis: Configures the IP address of a virtual network adapter to be used when a virtual machine fails over.

Synopsis:
Set-VMNetworkAdapterRdma [-VMName] <string> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-Name <string>] [-RdmaWeight <uint32>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-VMNetworkAdapterRdma -ManagementOS [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-Name <string>] [-RdmaWeight <uint32>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-VMNetworkAdapterRdma [-VMNetworkAdapter] <VMNetworkAdapterBase> [-RdmaWeight <uint32>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-VMNetworkAdapterRdma [-VM] <VirtualMachine> [-Name <string>] [-RdmaWeight <uint32>] [-Passthru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Set-VMNetworkAdapterRoutingDomainMapping
Synopsis: Sets virtual subnets on a routing domain.

Name: Set-VMNetworkAdapterVlan
Synopsis: Configures the virtual LAN settings for the traffic through a virtual network adapter.

Name: Set-VMPartitionableGpu
Synopsis:
Set-VMPartitionableGpu [[-ComputerName] <string[]>] [[-Credential] <pscredential[]>] [-Passthru] [-PartitionCount <uint16>] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-VMPartitionableGpu [-CimSession] <CimSession[]> [-Passthru] [-PartitionCount <uint16>] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-VMPartitionableGpu [-PartitionableGpu] <VMPartitionableGpu[]> [-Passthru] [-PartitionCount <uint16>] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-VMPartitionableGpu [-Passthru] [-Name <string>] [-PartitionCount <uint16>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Set-VMProcessor
Synopsis: Configures one or more processors of a virtual machine.

Name: Set-VMRemoteFx3dVideoAdapter
Synopsis: Configures the RemoteFX 3D video adapter of a virtual machine.

Name: Set-VMReplication
Synopsis: Modifies the replication settings of a virtual machine.

Name: Set-VMReplicationAuthorizationEntry
Synopsis: Modifies an authorization entry on a Replica server.

Name: Set-VMReplicationServer
Synopsis: Configures a host as a Replica server.

Name: Set-VMResourcePool
Synopsis: Sets the parent resource pool for a selected resource pool.

Name: Set-VMSan
Synopsis: Configures a virtual storage area network (SAN) on one or more Hyper-V hosts.

Name: Set-VMSecurity
Synopsis: Configures security settings for a virtual machine.

Name: Set-VMSecurityPolicy
Synopsis: Configures the security policy for a virtual machine.

Name: Set-VMStorageSettings
Synopsis:
Set-VMStorageSettings [-VMName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-Passthru] [-DisableInterruptBatching <bool>] [-ThreadCountPerChannel <ThreadCount>] [-VirtualProcessorsPerChannel <uint16>] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-VMStorageSettings [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [-Passthru] [-DisableInterruptBatching <bool>] [-ThreadCountPerChannel <ThreadCount>] [-VirtualProcessorsPerChannel <uint16>] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Set-VMSwitch
Synopsis: Configures a virtual switch.

Name: Set-VMSwitchExtensionPortFeature
Synopsis: Configures a feature on a virtual network adapter.

Name: Set-VMSwitchExtensionSwitchFeature
Synopsis: Configures a feature on a virtual switch.

Name: Set-VMSwitchTeam
Synopsis: Configures a virtual switch team.

Name: Set-VMVideo
Synopsis: Configures video settings for virtual machines.

Name: Start-VM
Synopsis: Starts a virtual machine.

Name: Start-VMFailover
Synopsis: Starts failover on a virtual machine.

Name: Start-VMInitialReplication
Synopsis: Starts replication of a virtual machine.

Name: Start-VMTrace
Synopsis: Starts tracing to a file.

Name: Stop-VM
Synopsis: Shuts down, turns off, or saves a virtual machine.

Name: Stop-VMFailover
Synopsis: Stops failover of a virtual machine.

Name: Stop-VMInitialReplication
Synopsis: Stops an ongoing initial replication.

Name: Stop-VMReplication
Synopsis: Cancels an ongoing virtual machine resynchronization.

Name: Stop-VMTrace
Synopsis: Stops tracing to file.

Name: Suspend-VM
Synopsis: Suspends, or pauses, a virtual machine.

Name: Suspend-VMReplication
Synopsis: Suspends replication of a virtual machine.

Name: Test-VHD
Synopsis: Tests a virtual hard disk for any problems that would make it unusable.

Name: Test-VMNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Tests connectivity between virtual machines.

Name: Test-VMReplicationConnection
Synopsis: Tests the connection between a primary server and a Replica server.

Name: Update-VMVersion
Synopsis: Updates the version of virtual machines.

Name: Wait-VM
Synopsis:
Wait-VM [-Name] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ComputerName <string[]>] [-Credential <pscredential[]>] [-AsJob] [-Passthru] [-For <WaitVMTypes>] [-Delay <uint16>] [-Timeout <int>] [<CommonParameters>]

Wait-VM [-VM] <VirtualMachine[]> [-AsJob] [-Passthru] [-For <WaitVMTypes>] [-Delay <uint16>] [-Timeout <int>] [<CommonParameters>]
